WorkItem.Description:
From thread:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=66215
----
 
Any row having an explicit row dimension loses its autoFit row height property in output generated by PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5.
 
Test:
----
$excel = new PHPExcel();
 
$sheet = $excel->getActiveSheet();
 
// this line is not supposed to make any difference, but it does with Excel5 writer
$sheet->getRowDimension('1');
 
$writer = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createWriter($excel, 'Excel5');
$writer->save('write.xls');
 
$writer = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createWriter($excel, 'Excel2007');
$writer->save('write.xlsx');
 
Expected result:
----
All rows have autoFit row height (because that is the default). In particular row 1 should also have autoFit row height.
 
Actual result:
----
Row 1 does not have autoFit row height in output by Excel5 writer. (The row height has even got slightly smaller)
 
To check, do this in MS Office Excel 2007:
 
* type in some "lorem ipsum" text in cell A1
* Click on "wrap text" for cell A1.
* Notice that row height stays the same in Excel5 generated output (which is unexpected). Excel2007 output is ok
 
write.xls screen shot in MS Office Excel 2007 after above steps:
http://img504.imageshack.us/img504/6603/ss20090821224128.png
 
write.xlsx screen shot in MS Office Excel 2007 after above steps:
http://img504.imageshack.us/img504/7134/ss20090821224223.png
 
Enviromment:
----
PHPExcel 1.7.0
WorkItem.Summary: AutoFit (autosize) row height not working in PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5

Comments.Message: I've downloaded the latest version and the bug persists is it normal ?

@benoitnadaud
The bug is present in PHPExcel 1.7.0, but it should be fixed in latest source code:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/SourceControl/ListDownloadableCommits.aspx

Which one did you try?
